cause.description:
School shooting is a term that waspopularized in North American media to describe gun violence at educational institutions. A school shooting can be perpetrated by one or more students, either expelled students, alumni, or outsiders. School shootings usually involve multiple intended or actual victims, often randomly targeted.
They often result in nationwide changes of schools' policies concerning discipline and security.
With four school shootings in 18 years, Montreal has had more than any other city on Earth, The École Polytechnique Massacre in 1989, The Concordia University Massacre in 1992, A shooting at a Montreal language school in 1997 and most recently The Dawson College Shooting in 2006.
cause.mission: To end gun violence in schools
cause.name: Stopping Gun Violence and School Shootings
